name: eltrans

stmt.origin: bitr4i(wcel(c0, ctrans), wtr(c0), wcel(c0, cdif(universe, crn(cdif(ccom(cep, cep), cep)))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ctrans), wtr(c0))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctrans), wcel(c0, cdif(universe, crn(cdif(ccom(cep, cep), cep)))))
-| wb(wtr(c0), wcel(c0, cdif(universe, crn(cdif(ccom(cep, cep), cep)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ctrans), wtr(c0))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctrans), wcel(c0, cdif(universe, crn(cdif(ccom(cep, cep), cep)))))
-| wb(wtr(c0), wcel(c0, cdif(universe, crn(cdif(ccom(cep, cep), cep)))))

stmt.origin: eleq2i(c0, ctrans, cdif(universe, crn(cdif(ccom(cep, cep), cep))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ctrans), wcel(c0, cdif(universe, crn(cdif(ccom(cep, cep), cep)))))
-| wceq(ctrans, cdif(universe, crn(cdif(ccom(cep, cep), cep))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ctrans), wtr(c0))
-| wb(wtr(c0), wcel(c0, cdif(universe, crn(cdif(ccom(cep, cep), cep)))))
-| wceq(ctrans, cdif(universe, crn(cdif(ccom(cep, cep), cep))))

|- wb(wcel(c0, ctrans), wtr(c0))
-| wb(wtr(c0), wcel(c0, cdif(universe, crn(cdif(ccom(cep, cep), cep)))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wtr(c0), wcel(c0, cdif(universe, crn(cdif(ccom(cep, cep), cep)))))
-| wcel(c0, universe)

comment: Membership in the class of all transitive sets. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 31-Mar-2012.)
